name: Will Merrill

experience.title: Member of YGM's ECD Team
experience.detail: I'm currently helping out with a YGM project for building a directory for extracurriculars at Yale.

extracurriculars.title: the Book of Thoth
extracurriculars.desc: A natural-language puzzle/adventure game set in ancient Egypt, of which I am the lead developer. Steam release scheduled for late October. Contact me if you would like to contribute animation, level design, or programming!

extracurriculars.title: Yale DotA 2
extracurriculars.desc: Yale's premier eSports organization for DotA 2

bio: Interested in formal language theory, programming, and game design. Collaborating on great things at YGM, and trying to build Yale DotA2 into a respectable college e-sports organization.
shortBio: I've spent a lot of time learning useless dead languages and I enjoy fun programming projects. I also play a lot of video games
